text: We’re honored to support this vital effort protecting access to #HCQ and #chloroquine for people with #lupus & #RA. Kudos to @ACRheum for their leadership and for including the #patientvoice. #WithoutMyHCQ @IFAiArthritis @SjogrensOrg @GHLForg @RNSociety @CSROAdvocacy @AWIRGROUP https://t.co/GQTjj0gxUb
